Package org.ejbca.core.model.services.workers

Class CertificateExpirationNotifierWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ejbca.core.model.services.BaseWorker
      • org.ejbca.core.model.services.workers.EmailSendingWorker
        • org.ejbca.core.model.services.workers.CertificateExpirationNotifierWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWorker
    public class CertificateExpirationNotifierWorker
extends EmailSendingWorker
    Makes queries about which certificates that is about to expire in a given number of days and creates a notification sent to either the end user or the administrator. version: $Id: CertificateExpirationNotifierWorker.java 29010 2018-05-23 13:09:53Z jekaterina_b_helmes $
